scripts.clean:pnpm: lerna exec --stream -- rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml && rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm clean
scripts.ts-prune: git clean -f -d -X packages/adapters/**/src && lerna exec --ignore @public-ui/slidev --stream -- npx ts-prune src -e
scripts.ncu:major: ncu -x rimraf && lerna exec --stream -- ncu -x rimraf
scripts.ncu:minor: ncu -t minor -u -x rimraf && lerna exec --stream -- ncu -t minor -u -x @slidev/cli,rimraf,rxjs,typescript,unbuild,zone.js
scripts.ncu:patch: ncu -t patch -u -x rimraf && lerna exec --stream -- ncu -t patch -u -x rimraf,unbuild
scripts.update: pnpm ncu:patch && pnpm ncu:minor && pnpm ncu:major
